abstract: While his legacy and tenure are under pressure from Carl C. Icahn, no one expects Genzyme chief Henri A. Termeer to go easily, The New York Times reports.
snippet: While his legacy and tenure are under pressure from Carl C. Icahn, no one expects Genzyme chief Henri A. Termeer to go easily, The New York Times reports.
lead_paragraph: In the biotechnology business, where executives or even entire companies can come and go in an instant, Henri A. Termeer has been a constant.

headline.main: Genzyme Chief May Not Go Gently
